alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 1:21PM AKST until January 21 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills and blowing snow with low visibility occurring. Plan on slippery road conditions. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Winds gusting to 40 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow with visibility one half mile or less at times. Wind chills to 40 below occuring. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch are expected. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 PM Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
